attributes.action: Debate: Financial viability analysis of the United Kindoms EU membership
attributes.additional_details:
That Parliament conduct a value for money analysis of the UK 's financial expenditure incurred as an EU member state compared to the financial benefits recieved from the EU across all cost centres since the UK joined the EEC in 1972/3.
The analysis to include all funds ring fenced for Euro-zone bailouts through the IMF.
